data.Text: Thank you for your interest! A sales representative will contact you within 24 hours to discuss how our solution can meet your needs.
Thank you for taking our survey! We hope you found the product recommendation helpful. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions in the future.
What is your primary goal for this product?

data.Name: Enterprise Pro
data.Description: Our most comprehensive solution for large enterprises requiring advanced features, customization, and dedicated support.
data.Features: Advanced analytics and reporting,24/7 dedicated support,Highly customizable,On-premises deployment,Enterprise-grade security

data.Name: Business Starter
data.Description: Perfect for small to medium businesses looking for an affordable, easy-to-use solution with quick implementation.
data.Features: Quick setup and implementation,Affordable pricing,Cloud-hosted solution,Basic reporting,Email support

data.Name: Professional Plus
data.Description: Ideal for growing companies that need a balance of features, flexibility, and reasonable pricing.
data.Features: Moderate customization,Business hours support,Hybrid deployment options,Comprehensive reporting,Mobile web access

data.Name: Enterprise Elite
data.Description: Our flagship solution for organizations requiring the highest level of security, compliance, and scalability.
data.Features: Maximum security and compliance,Unlimited scalability,Custom integrations,Dedicated account manager,On-premises or hybrid deployment
data.BestFor: Large organizations with strict compliance requirements

data.Name: Startup Accelerator
data.Description: Designed specifically for startups and early-stage companies that need rapid growth and scalability.
data.Features: Rapid deployment and scaling,Startup-friendly pricing,Growth-focused features,Flexible payment terms,Dedicated startup support

data.Name: Government & Non-Profit
data.Description: Specialized solution for government agencies and non-profit organizations with compliance and budget requirements.
data.Features: Government compliance,Non-profit pricing,Specialized reporting,Grant management tools,Dedicated compliance support
